  1. ä¸äºˆä¿ä¿®
  2. è´¹ç”µï¼Œè¶Šç‹±åçš„iOSç³»ç»Ÿä¼šå¸¸é©»ä¸€äº›è¿›ç¨‹ï¼Œè€—ç”µé€Ÿåº¦æå‡çº¦10%~20%

  4. ä¸å†å—iOSç³»ç»Ÿé»˜è®¤çš„å®‰å…¨ä¿æŠ¤ï¼Œå®¹æ˜“è¢«æ¶æ„è½¯ä»¶æ”»å‡»ï¼Œä¸ªäººéšç§æœ‰è¢«çªƒå–çš„é£é™©
  5. å¦‚æœå®‰è£…äº†ä¸ç¨³å®šçš„æ’ä»¶ï¼Œå®¹æ˜“è®©ç³»ç»Ÿå˜å¾—ä¸ç¨³å®šã€å˜æ…¢ï¼Œç”šè‡³å‡ºç°â€œç™½è‹¹æœâ€ç­‰é—®é¢˜

å®Œç¾è¶Šç‹±ä¸ä¸å®Œç¾è¶Šç‹±

  • ä¸å®Œç¾è¶Šç‹±ï¼šiPhoneä¸€æ—¦å…³æœºåå†å¼€æœºæ—¶ï¼Œå±å¹•ä¼šä¸€ç›´åœç•™åœ¨å¯åŠ¨ç”»é¢ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯â€œç™½è‹¹æœâ€çŠ¶æ€ã€‚æˆ–è€…èƒ½æ­£å¸¸å¼€æœºï¼Œä½†å·²ç»å®‰è£…çš„ç ´è§£è½¯ä»¶æ— æ³•æ­£å¸¸ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œéœ€è¦é‡æ–°è¿æ¥PCè¿›è¡Œå¼•å¯¼æ‰èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

å¦‚ä½•åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦è¶Šç‹±æˆåŠŸï¼Ÿ

  2. PPåŠ©æ‰‹æŸ¥çœ‹

è¶Šç‹±æˆåŠŸåéœ€è¦å®‰è£…çš„ä¸€äº›æ’ä»¶

  2. AppSync Unifiedï¼šå¯ä»¥ç»•è¿‡ç³»ç»ŸéªŒè¯ï¼Œéšæ„å®‰è£…ã€è¿è¡Œç ´è§£çš„ipaå®‰è£…åŒ…
  3. iFileï¼šå¯ä»¥åœ¨iPhoneä¸Šè‡ªç”±è®¿é—®iOSæ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿ

Macå¿…å¤‡

  1. iFunBoxï¼šç®¡ç†æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿ
  2. PPåŠ©æ‰‹

å¦‚ä½•åœ¨iOSä»£ç ä¸­åˆ¤æ–­è®¾å¤‡æ˜¯å¦è¶Šç‹±ï¼Ÿ

  1. æœ€ç®€å•çš„ä¸€ç§æ–¹æ³•ï¼šåˆ¤æ–­æ‰‹æœºæ˜¯å¦å®‰è£…äº†Cydia
+ (BOOL)re_isJailback {
    return [[NSFileManage defaultManager] fileExistsAtPath:@"/Applications/Cydia.app"];
}
  1. æ›´å®Œæ•´çš„æ–¹æ³•
#import <sys/stat.h>
#import <dlfcn.h>

+ (BOOL)re_isJailback {
    // æ£€æµ‹ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
    // Mac/iOSå¯ä»¥é€è¿‡è®¾ç½®DYLD_INSERT_LIBRARIESï¼Œè¯´æ˜åŠ¨æ€åº“è¢«ä¿®æ”¹è¿‡
    if (getenv("DYLD_INSERT_LIVRARIES")) {
            return YES;
        }
        // æ£€æµ‹è¶Šç‹±ä¸­å¸¸è§çš„æ–‡ä»¶ã€æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
        static const char* pathes[] = {
            "/Applications/Cydia.app",
            "/Library/MobileSubstrate/MobileSubstrate.dylib",
            "/var/lib/cydia",
            "/var/lib/apt",
            "/var/cache/apt",
            "/etc/apt",
            "/bin/bash",
            "/bin/sh",
            "/usr/sbin/sshd",
            "/usr/libexec/ssh-keysig",
            "/etc/ssh/sshd_config"
        };
        
        static const int pathCount = sizeof(pathes) / sizeof(pathes[0]);
        // æ–‡ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯
        struct stat statInfo;
        // éå†æ–‡ä»¶
        for (int i = 0; i < pathCount; i++) {
            if (stat(pathes[i], &statInfo) == 0) {
                return YES;
            }
        }
        
        // æ²¡æœ‰è¶Šç‹±
        return NO;

}

entry.title: TabNavigator
entry.content:
https://github.com/happypancake/react-native-tab-navigator

1.å®‰è£… cdåˆ°é¡¹ç›®æ ¹è·¯å¾„ä¸‹ npm install react-native-tab-navigator --save

2.å¯¼å…¥import TabNavigator from 'react-native-tab-navigator';

3.

type Props = {};
export default class App extends Component<Props> {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.state = {
            selectedTab : 'home',
        }
    }
  render() {
    return (
        <View style={styles.container}>
            <TabNavigator>
                <TabNavigator.Item
                    selected={this.state.selectedTab === 'home'}
                    title="Home"
                    renderIcon={() => <Image source={require('./res/images/tab/tab_home.png')} />}
                    tintColor={'2da4fe'}
                    // renderSelectedIcon={() => <Image source={...} />}
                    // badgeText="1"
                    onPress={() => this.setState({ selectedTab: 'home' })}>
                    <View></View>
                </TabNavigator.Item>
                <TabNavigator.Item
                    selected={this.state.selectedTab === 'profile'}
                    title="Profile"
                    renderIcon={() => <Image source={require('./res/images/tab/tab_pk.png')} />}
                    tintColor={'2da4fe'}
                    // renderSelectedIcon={() => <Image source={...} />}
                    // renderBadge={() => <CustomBadgeView />}
                    onPress={() => this.setState({ selectedTab: 'profile' })}>
                    <View></View>
                </TabNavigator.Item>
            </TabNavigator>
        </View>
    );

  }

entry.title: iOS Core Dataå­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®°1ï¼šç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªCore Data App
entry.content:
é€šè¿‡æœ¬ç« ä½ å°†å­¦ä¹ åˆ°ï¼š

1.Xcodeåˆ›å»º/ç¼–è¾‘ Core Data Model

2.ä½¿ç”¨Core Dataä¿å­˜æ•°æ®

3.è·å–Core Dataé‡Œçš„æ•°æ®

è¶…é“¾æ¥

æœ€ç»ˆæ•ˆæœé¢„è§ˆ

1.Xcodeåˆ›å»º/ç¼–è¾‘ Core Data Model

1.æ‰“å¼€Xcodeï¼Œåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªSingle View Appå¹¶å‹¾é€‰Use Core Data

å‹¾é€‰Use Core Dataï¼ŒXcodeä¼šåœ¨AppDelegateä¼šç”ŸæˆCore Dataä»£ç æ¨¡æ¿

åœ¨Xcode 9ä¸­ï¼Œåªæœ‰master - detail Appå’ŒSingle View Appæ¨¡æ¿æ‰æœ‰Core Dataå¤é€‰æ¡†ã€‚

æ‰“å¼€Main.storyboardæ­å»ºUI

æ·»åŠ ä»£ç 

class ViewController: UIViewController {
    
    @IBOutlet weak var tableView: UITableView!
    
    var names: [String] = []
    
    override func viewDidLoad() {
        super.viewDidLoad()
        
        tableView.register(UITableViewCell.self, forCellReuseIdentifier: "Cell")
    }
    
    @IBAction func addClick(_ sender: UIBarButtonItem) {
        
        let alertController = UIAlertController(title: "New", message: "è¾“å…¥æ–°åå­—", preferredStyle: .alert)
        
        alertController.addAction(UIAlertAction(title: "ä¿å­˜", style: .default, handler: { [unowned self] (_) in
            guard let textField = alertController.textFields?.first,
                let name = textField.text else {
                    return
            }
            
            self.names.append(name)
            self.tableView.reloadData()
        }))
        
        alertController.addTextField(configurationHandler: nil)
        
        alertController.addAction(UIAlertAction(title: "å–æ¶ˆ", style: .cancel, handler: nil))
        present(alertController, animated: true, completion: nil)
    }
}

extension ViewController: UITableViewDataSource {
    
    func tableView(_ tableView: UITableView, numberOfRowsInSection section: Int) -> Int {
        return names.count
    }
    
    func tableView(_ tableView: UITableView, cellForRowAt indexPath: IndexPath) -> UITableViewCell {
            
        let cell = tableView.dequeueReusableCell(withIdentifier: "Cell", for: indexPath)
        cell.textLabel?.text = names[indexPath.row]
        return cell
    }
}

UIæ•ˆæœå¦‚ä¸‹

è¿™æ—¶ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ·»åŠ çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯å­˜åœ¨å†…å­˜é‡Œï¼Œç¨‹åºä¸€æ—¦é€€å‡ºæ•°æ®å°±æ²¡äº†ï¼Œä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è®²é€šè¿‡Core Dataè¿›ä¸€æ­¥åšæ•°æ®æŒä¹…åŒ–ã€‚

2.é€šè¿‡Core Dataåšæ•°æ®æŒä¹…åŒ–ã€‚

  1. å½“ä½ å‹¾é€‰Use Core Dataåˆ›å»ºåº”ç”¨æ—¶ï¼ŒXocdeä¼šé»˜è®¤ç»™ä½ åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªxcdatamodeld

  2. æ‰“å¼€.xcdatamodeldï¼Œç‚¹å‡»Add Entity

  3. åŒå‡»åˆšåˆšåˆ›å»ºçš„Entityæ”¹æˆä½ Modelçš„åå­—

è¿™é‡Œ Entity ç›¸å½“äºä¸€å¼ Modelï¼ŒAttributes æ˜¯ä»–çš„å±æ€§ï¼ŒRelationshipsæ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªModelå’Œå…¶ä»–Modelçš„å…³ç³»

  1. æˆ‘ä»¬å…ˆç»™Peopleæ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªAttributesï¼šname

  2. æ‰“å¼€ViewControllerä¿®æ”¹ä»£ç 

import CoreData

class ViewController: UIViewController {
    
    @IBOutlet weak var tableView: UITableView!
    
    var people: [NSManagedObject] = []
    
    override func viewDidLoad() {
        super.viewDidLoad()
        
        tableView.register(UITableViewCell.self, forCellReuseIdentifier: "Cell")
    }
    
    @IBAction func addClick(_ sender: UIBarButtonItem) {
        
        let alertController = UIAlertController(title: "New", message: "è¾“å…¥æ–°åå­—", preferredStyle: .alert)
        
        alertController.addAction(UIAlertAction(title: "ä¿å­˜", style: .default, handler: { [unowned self] (_) in
            guard let textField = alertController.textFields?.first,
                let name = textField.text else {
                    return
            }
            
            self.save(name: name)
            self.tableView.reloadData()
        }))
        
        alertController.addTextField(configurationHandler: nil)
        
        alertController.addAction(UIAlertAction(title: "å–æ¶ˆ", style: .cancel, handler: nil))
        present(alertController, animated: true, completion: nil)
    }
    
    func save(name: String) {
        guard let appDelegate = UIApplication.shared.delegate as? AppDelegate else {
            return
        }
        
        // 1.è·å–ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡
        let managedContext = appDelegate.persistentContainer.viewContext
        
        // 2.è·å–entity
        let entity = NSEntityDescription.entity(forEntityName: "People", in: managedContext)!
        
        // 3.åˆ›å»ºNSManagedObject
        let person = NSManagedObject(entity: entity, insertInto: managedContext)
        
        // 4.è®¾ç½®å±æ€§
        person.setValue(name, forKey: "name")
        
        // 5.ä¿å­˜
        do {
            try managedContext.save()
            people.append(person)
        } catch let error as NSError {
            print("Save Error: \(error), \(error.userInfo)")
        }
    }
}

extension ViewController: UITableViewDataSource {
    
    func tableView(_ tableView: UITableView, numberOfRowsInSection section: Int) -> Int {
        return people.count
    }
    
    func tableView(_ tableView: UITableView, cellForRowAt indexPath: IndexPath) -> UITableViewCell {
            
        let cell = tableView.dequeueReusableCell(withIdentifier: "Cell", for: indexPath)
        cell.textLabel?.text = people[indexPath.row].value(forKey: "name") as? String
        return cell
    }
}

3.è·å–Core Dataé‡Œçš„æ•°æ®

override func viewWillAppear(_ animated: Bool) {
        super.viewWillAppear(animated)
        
        guard let appDelegate = UIApplication.shared.delegate as? AppDelegate else {
            return
        }
        
        // 1
        let managedContext = appDelegate.persistentContainer.viewContext
        
        // 2
        let fetchRequest = NSFetchRequest<NSManagedObject>(entityName: "People")
        
        // 3
        do {
            people = try managedContext.fetch(fetchRequest)
        } catch let error as NSError {
            print("Could not fetch. \(error), \(error.userInfo)")
        }
    }

NSManagedObjectContext: åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨Core Dataåšä»»ä½•æ“ä½œæ—¶éƒ½è¦ç”¨åˆ°
NSFetchRequest: è´Ÿè´£ä»Core Dataè·å–ç±»ã€‚å¯ä»¥ç­›é€‰æŸäº›ç‰¹å®šæ•°æ®ã€‚ï¼ˆåé¢æ–‡ç« ï¼‰

entry.content:

æœ¬å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®°å°†åŸºäº Swift 4ï¼ŒiOS11 å’Œ Xcode9 è¿›è¡Œç¼–å†™
æœ¬åšå®¢ä»…ä¸ºå­¦ä¹ è®°å½•ç¬”è®°ä¹‹ç”¨

Core Dataæ˜¯OS Xå’ŒiOS SDKsçš„å¯¹è±¡æŒä¹…åŒ–ç®¡ç†æ¡†æ¶ã€‚ä½†Core Dataä¸åƒSQLiteå’ŒMySQLï¼Œä½ ä¸éœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘è¡¨ã€è¡Œï¼Œå’Œä¸»é”®ã€‚

entry.title: AVAudioPlayeræ’­æ”¾éŸ³é¢‘è¯¦è§£
entry.content:
AVAudioPlayeræ„å»ºäºCore Audioä¸­çš„C-based Audio Queue Servicesçš„æœ€é¡¶å±‚ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥å®ƒå¯ä»¥æä¾›æ‰€æœ‰ä½ åœ¨Audio Queue Servicesä¸­æ‰€èƒ½æ‰¾åˆ°çš„æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚æ’­æ”¾ã€å¾ªç¯ç”šè‡³éŸ³é¢‘è®¡é‡ã€‚é™¤éä½ éœ€è¦ä»ç½‘ç»œæµä¸­æ’­æ”¾éŸ³é¢‘ã€éœ€è¦è®¿é—®åŸå§‹éŸ³é¢‘æ ·æœ¬æˆ–è€…éœ€è¦éå¸¸ä½çš„æ—¶å»¶ï¼Œå¦åˆ™AVAudioPlayeréƒ½èƒ½èƒœä»»ã€‚

1. 1. åˆ›å»ºAVAudioPlayer

#import <AVFoundation/AVFoundation.h>
    
@interface ViewController ()
    
@property (strong, nonatomic) AVAudioPlayer *player;
    
@end
    
@implementation ViewController
    
- (void)viewDidLoad {
Â  Â  [super viewDidLoad];
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  // urlå¿…é¡»æ˜¯æ²™ç›’æˆ–iPodé‡Œçš„èµ„æº
Â  Â  NSURL *url = [[NSBundle mainBundle] URLForResource:@"éš¾å¿µçš„ç»" withExtension:@"mp3"];
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  // å¯èƒ½æ˜¯nil
Â  Â  self.player = [[AVAudioPlayer alloc] initWithContentsOfURL:url error:nil];
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  // éŸ³é‡ 0 - 1
Â  Â  self.player.volume = 0.5;
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  // ç«‹ä½“å£° -1ï¼ˆæå·¦ï¼‰åˆ° 1ï¼ˆæå³ï¼‰é»˜è®¤ 0 (å±…ä¸­)
Â  Â  self.player.pan = -1;
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  // æ’­æ”¾é€Ÿç‡ 0.5 - 2
Â  Â  self.player.rate = 1.5;
Â  Â  self.player.enableRate = YES;
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  // å¾ªç¯ -1 æ— é™å¾ªç¯
Â  Â  self.player.numberOfLoops = -1;
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  if (self.player) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  // è¿™é‡Œä¼šå–å¾—éœ€è¦çš„éŸ³é¢‘ç¡¬ä»¶å¹¶é¢„åŠ è½½Audio Queueçš„ç¼“å†²åŒºã€‚
Â  Â  Â  Â  // å¯ä»¥å‡ä½è°ƒç”¨playæ–¹æ³•å’Œå¬åˆ°å£°éŸ³è¾“å‡ºçš„å»¶è¿Ÿ
Â  Â  Â  Â  [self.player prepareToPlay];
Â  Â  }
}
    
- (void)touchesBegan:(NSSet<UITouch *> *)touches withEvent:(UIEvent *)eventÂ  {
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  if ([self.player isPlaying]) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  [self.player pause];
Â  Â  } else {
Â  Â  Â  Â  [self.player play];
Â  Â  }
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  // å‡å¦‚è°ƒç”¨ stop ä¼šæŠŠ prepareToPlay æ‰€åšçš„éƒ½æ’¤é”€æ‰
//Â  Â  [self.player stop];
//Â  Â  self.player.currentTime = 0;
}

2.é…ç½®éŸ³é¢‘ä¼šè¯

åœ¨AppDelegateé‡Œè®¾ç½®

AVAudioSession *session = [AVAudioSession sharedInstance];
    Â Â  Â 
NSError *error;
if (![session setCategory:AVAudioSessionCategoryPlayback error:&error]) {
    NSLog(@"Audio Category Error: %@", [error localizedDescription]);
}
Â Â  Â 
if (![session setActive:YES error:&error]) {
    NSLog(@"Audio Active Error: %@", [error localizedDescription]);
}

3.å¼€å¯åå°æ’­æ”¾

4.å¤„ç†ä¸­æ–­äº‹ä»¶

æ³¨å†ŒAVAudioSessioné€šçŸ¥AVAudioSessionInterruptionNotificationã€‚

 // æ³¨å†Œä¸­æ–­é€šçŸ¥
[[NSNotificationCenter defaultCenter] addObserver:self selector:@selector(handelInterruption:) name:AVAudioSessionInterruptionNotification object:[AVAudioSession sharedInstance]];
    
    
- (void)handelInterruption:(NSNotification *)notification {
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  NSDictionary *info = notification.userInfo;
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  AVAudioSessionInterruptionType type = [info[AVAudioSessionInterruptionTypeKey] unsignedIntegerValue];
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  if (type == AVAudioSessionInterruptionTypeBegan) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  // Handle AVAudioSessionInterruptionTypeBegan
Â  Â  Â  Â  [self.player stop];
Â  Â  } else {
Â  Â  Â  Â  // Handle AVAudioSessionInterruptionTypeEnd
Â  Â  Â  Â  // å¦‚æœä¸­æ–­ç±»å‹ä¸ºAVAudioSessionInterruptionTypeEndï¼ŒuserInfoå­—å…¸ä¸­ä¼šåŒ…å«ä¸€ä¸ªAVAudioSessionInterruptionOptionæ¥è¡¨æ˜éŸ³é¢‘ä¼šè¯æ˜¯å¦å·²ç»é‡æ–°æ¿€æ´»ä»¥åŠæ˜¯å¦å¯ä»¥å†æ¬¡æ’­æ”¾
Â  Â  Â  Â  AVAudioSessionInterruptionOptions options = [info[AVAudioSessionInterruptionOptionKey] unsignedIntegerValue];
Â  Â  Â  Â  if (options == AVAudioSessionInterruptionOptionShouldResume) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  [self.player play];
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  }
}

5.å¤„ç†çº¿è·¯æ”¹å˜çš„å“åº”

åœ¨iOSè®¾å¤‡ä¸Šæ·»åŠ æˆ–ä¸€å¤„éŸ³é¢‘è¾“å…¥ã€è¾“å‡ºçº¿è·¯æ—¶ï¼Œä¼šå‘ç”Ÿçº¿è·¯æ”¹å˜ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ç”¨æˆ·æ’ä¸Š/æ‹”æ‰è€³æœºï¼ŒéŸ³é¢‘ä¼šæ ¹æ®æƒ…å†µæ”¹å˜è¾“å…¥æˆ–è¾“å…¥çº¿è·¯ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶AVAudioSessionä¼šå¹¿æ’­ä¸€ä¸ªæè¿°è¯¥å˜åŒ–çš„é€šçŸ¥ã€‚

// æ³¨å†Œçº¿è·¯æ”¹å˜é€šçŸ¥
Â  Â  [[NSNotificationCenter defaultCenter] addObserver:self selector:@selector(handelRouteChange:) name:AVAudioSessionRouteChangeNotification object:[AVAudioSession sharedInstance]];
    
    
// çº¿è·¯æ”¹å˜é€šçŸ¥
- (void)handelRouteChange:(NSNotification *)notification {
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  NSDictionary *info = notification.userInfo;
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  AVAudioSessionRouteChangeReason reason = [info[AVAudioSessionRouteChangeReasonKey] unsignedIntegerValue];
Â Â  Â 
Â  Â  if (reason == AVAudioSessionRouteChangeReasonOldDeviceUnavailable) {
Â  Â  Â  Â  // è·å–å‰ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿è·¯çš„AVAudioSessionRouteDescription
Â  Â  Â  Â  AVAudioSessionRouteDescription *previousRoute = info[AVAudioSessionRouteChangePreviousRouteKey];
Â Â  Â  Â  Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  // æ‰¾åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªè¾“å‡ºæ¥å£
Â  Â  Â  Â  AVAudioSessionPortDescription *previousOutput = previousRoute.outputs[0];
Â  Â  Â  Â  NSString *portType = previousOutput.portType;
Â Â  Â  Â  Â 
Â  Â  Â  Â  if ([portType isEqualToString:AVAudioSessionPortHeadphones]) {// æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯è€³æœº
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  // å½“æ–­å¼€è€³æœºæ—¶ï¼Œåœæ­¢æ’­æ”¾éŸ³é¢‘
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  [self.player stop];
Â  Â  Â  Â  }
Â  Â  }
}

entry.title: åŸºäºmacOS&Xcode9æ­å»ºOpenGL+GLFW+gladå¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒ
entry.content:
1.å®‰è£…homebrew
2.GLFW
3.glad
4.Xcodeé…ç½®
5.Demoå±•ç¤º

1.å®‰è£…homebrew

å‰å¾€Homebrewå®‰è£…

2.GLFW

brew install glfw3

å®‰è£…å®Œæˆåï¼ŒGLFWè½¯ä»¶åŒ…ä¼šåœ¨/usr/local/Cellarä¸‹

3.glad

  1. æ‰“å¼€GLADçš„åœ¨çº¿æœåŠ¡ï¼Œå°†è¯­è¨€(Language)è®¾ç½®ä¸ºC/C++ï¼Œåœ¨APIé€‰é¡¹ä¸­ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©3.3ä»¥ä¸Šçš„OpenGL(gl)ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼ˆæœ¬æ•™ç¨‹ä¸­å°†ä½¿ç”¨3.3ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œä½†æ›´æ–°çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¹Ÿèƒ½æ­£å¸¸å·¥ä½œï¼‰ã€‚ä¹‹åå°†æ¨¡å¼(Profile)è®¾ç½®ä¸ºCoreï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä¿è¯ç”ŸæˆåŠ è½½å™¨(Generate a loader)çš„é€‰é¡¹æ˜¯é€‰ä¸­çš„ã€‚ç°åœ¨å¯ä»¥å…ˆï¼ˆæš‚æ—¶ï¼‰å¿½ç•¥æ‹“å±•(Extensions)ä¸­çš„å†…å®¹ã€‚éƒ½é€‰æ‹©å®Œä¹‹åï¼Œç‚¹å‡»ç”Ÿæˆ(Generate)æŒ‰é’®æ¥ç”Ÿæˆåº“æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

  2. GLADç°åœ¨åº”è¯¥æä¾›ç»™ä½ äº†ä¸€ä¸ªzipå‹ç¼©æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ŒåŒ…å«ä¸¤ä¸ªå¤´æ–‡ä»¶ç›®å½•ï¼Œå’Œä¸€ä¸ªglad.cæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚ä¸‹è½½glad.zip

3.å°†glad.zipè§£å‹åˆ°/usr/local/Cellarä¸‹

4.Xcodeé…ç½®

1.æ·»åŠ Custom Paths
åœ¨Xcodeä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°Peferenceèœå•é¡¹ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªä¸€èˆ¬åœ¨Fileèœå•é¡¹å·¦è¾¹çš„é‚£ä¸ªXcodeé¡¹ç›®ä¸­ï¼Œç„¶ååœ¨é‡Œé¢æ‰¾åˆ°Locationsé¡¹ï¼Œå†ç‚¹å‡»Custom Pathsï¼Œæ·»åŠ 3é¡¹

Name Display Name Path
glad_header glad_header /usr/local/Cellar/glad/include
glfw_header glfw_header /usr/local/Cellar/glfw/3.2.1/include
glfw_lib glfw_lib /usr/local/Cellar/glfw/3.2.1/lib

2.åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªmacoSå‘½ä»¤è¡ŒC++é¡¹ç›®

3.è®¾ç½®Build Settings Header/Library Search Paths
Header Search Paths

Library Search Paths

4.Build Phases->Complile Sources æ·»åŠ glad.c

Add Other...

æŒ‰ä½command+shift+g
è¾“å…¥gladè·¯å¾„/usr/local/Cellar/glad

æ·»åŠ glad.c

6.æ·»åŠ ä¾èµ–åº“

Xcode9æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°dylibåº“ï¼Ÿç‚¹å‡»Add Other

æŒ‰ä¸‹command+shift+g è¾“å…¥glfwçš„è·¯å¾„/usr/local/Cellar/glfw

é€‰æ‹©libglfw.3.2.dylib

5.Demoå±•ç¤º

æ‰“å¼€é¡¹ç›®main.cppæ–‡ä»¶ç¼–å†™ä»£ç 

#include <iostream>
#import <glad/glad.h>
#import <GLFW/glfw3.h>

void framebuffer_size_callback(GLFWwindow* window, int width, int height)
{
    glViewport(0, 0, width, height);
}

int main(int argc, const char * argv[]) {
    
    glfwInit();
    glfwWindowHint(GLFW_CONTEXT_VERSION_MAJOR, 3);
    glfwWindowHint(GLFW_CONTEXT_VERSION_MINOR, 3);
    glfwWindowHint(GLFW_OPENGL_PROFILE, GLFW_OPENGL_CORE_PROFILE);
    glfwWindowHint(GLFW_OPENGL_FORWARD_COMPAT, GL_TRUE);
    
    GLFWwindow* window = glfwCreateWindow(800, 600, "OpenGL+GLFW+gladç¯å¢ƒæ­å»º", NULL, NULL);
    if (window == NULL)
    {
        std::cout << "Failed to create GLFW window" << std::endl;
        glfwTerminate();
        return -1;
    }
    glfwMakeContextCurrent(window);
    
    if (!gladLoadGLLoader((GLADloadproc)glfwGetProcAddress))
    {
        std::cout << "Failed to initialize GLAD" << std::endl;
        return -1;
    }
    glViewport(0, 0, 800, 600);
    glfwSetFramebufferSizeCallback(window, framebuffer_size_callback);
    
    while(!glfwWindowShouldClose(window))
    {
        glfwSwapBuffers(window);
        glfwPollEvents();
    }
    
    glfwTerminate();
    return 0;
}

è¿è¡Œåä½ å°†çœ‹åˆ°å¦‚ä¸‹

entry.title: Swift4æ–°ç‰¹æ€§
entry.content:
æ‘˜å½•æ¥è‡ª: By the raywenderlich.com Tutorial Team. â€œiOS 11 by Tutorialsâ€ã€‚

One-sided ranges

â€œlet esports = ["Hearthstone", "CS:GO", "League of Legends", 
               "Super Smash Bros", "Overwatch", "Gigantic"]
                  
esports[3...]
// returns ["Super Smash Bros", "Overwatch", "Gigantic"]

// In Swift 3, you had to write
esports[3..<esports.endIndex]

esports[...2]
// returns ["Hearthstone", "CS:GO", "League of Legends"]

esports[..<2]
// returns ["Hearthstone", "CS:GO"]â€

Infinite sequences

â€œlet uppercase = ["A", "B", "C", "D"]
let asciiCodes = zip(65..., uppercase)
print(Array(asciiCodes))
// prints [(65, "A"), (66, "B"), (67, "C"), (68, "D")]â€

Pattern matching

â€œfunc gameRank(_ index: Int) -> String {
  switch index {
  case ...1:
    return "Oldie but goodie"
  case 3...:
    return "Meh"
  default:
    return "Awesome-sauce!"
  }
}

gameRank(2) 
// prints "Awesome-sauce!â€

Strings

â€œlet text = "Hakuna Matata"
let unicodeText = "ğŸ‘‡ğŸ¿ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ¤ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·"

text.count      // 13
text.isEmpty    // false
"".isEmpty      // true

// `reversed()` returns a `ReversedCollection<String>` so
// it must be converted back to `String`
String(text.reversed()) 
// "atataM anukaHâ€

var index = text.index(text.startIndex, offsetBy: 7)
text[index]
// "M"

// You can use prefix(upTo:) and suffix(from:) 
// but why not use one-sided ranges instead

let lastWord = text[index...]
// lastWord is "Matata"

index = text.index(text.endIndex, offsetBy: -7)
let firstWord = text[..<index]
// firstWord is "Hakunaâ€

Introducing Substring

type(of: lastWord)
// Substring.Type

lastWord.uppercased()
// "MATATA"

let lastWordAsString = String(lastWord)
type(of: lastWordAsString)
// String.Type

Unicode magic

// swift3
let c: Character = "ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡­"
Array(c.unicodeScalars)
// [127464, 127469]

// swift4
"ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·".count    // 3
"ğŸ‘‡ğŸ¿".count        // 1
"ğŸ‘ğŸ»".count        // 1
"ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¹".count        // 1

let population = "1ï¸âƒ£ğŸ‘©ğŸ½â€ğŸŒ¾2ï¸âƒ£ğŸ“3ï¸âƒ£ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§â€ğŸ‘¦"
population.count
// 6

var nsRange = NSRange(population.startIndex..., 
                      in: population)
// population.startIndex... is a Range<String.Index>
// (0, 29)

population.utf16.count
// 29

let display = NSMutableAttributedString(
        string: population, 
        attributes: [.font: UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: 20)])


let oneIndex = population.index(of: "1ï¸âƒ£")!
let twoIndex = population.index(of: "2ï¸âƒ£")!
let threeIndex = population.index(of: "3ï¸âƒ£")!
var range = oneIndex..<twoIndex
nsRange = NSRange(range, in: population)
display.addAttribute(.font, 
                     value: UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: 40), 
                     range: nsRange)


range = twoIndex..<threeIndex
nsRange = NSRange(range, in: population)
display.addAttribute(.font, 
                     value: UIFont.systemFont(ofSize: 30), 
                     range: nsRange)


let textInput = "You have traveled 483.2 miles."
let pattern = "[0-9]+(\\.([0-9])?)?"
let regex = try! NSRegularExpression(pattern: pattern, 
                                     options: [])
nsRange = NSRange(textInput.startIndex..., in: textInput)
let mileage = regex.rangeOfFirstMatch(in: textInput, 
                                      range: nsRange)
range = Range(mileage, in: textInput)!
textInput[range]
// "483.2â€

Multi-line string literals

let firstVerse = """
  Half a league, half a league,
    Half a league onward,
  All in the valley of Death
    Rode the six hundred.
  "Forward, the Light Brigade!
  "Charge for the guns!" he said:
  Into the valley of Death
    Rode the six hundred.
  ""
print(firstVerse) results in:

entry.title: iOSä¸€ä¸ªæ”¯æŒï¼ˆ1-nï¼‰çº§ä¸‹æ‹‰ç­›é€‰ç»„ä»¶
entry.content:
GXComboBox




  • ä¸€ä¸ªæ”¯æŒï¼ˆ1-nï¼‰çº§ä¸‹æ‹‰ç­›é€‰ç»„ä»¶(ä¼ é€é—¨)

Requirements

  • iOS 9.0+
  • Swift 3

Example

To run the example project, clone the repo, and run pod install from the Example directory first.

Installation

GXComboBox is available through CocoaPods. To install
it, simply add the following line to your Podfile:

pod 'GXComboBox'

Contents

How to use GXComboBox

  • GXComboBox use is like UITableView
comboBoxView.delegate = self
comboBoxView.dataSoure = self

// MARK: GXComboBoxViewDataSoure
protocol GXComboBoxViewDataSoure {
    
    /// åœ¨è¿™é‡Œæ³¨å†Œæ¯ä¸ªTableView Cell
    ///
    /// - Parameters:
    ///   - comboBoxView: comboBoxView
    ///   - column: åˆ—æ•°
    ///   - section: ç¬¬å‡ ä¸ªTableView
    ///   - tableView: TableView
    /// - Returns: void
    func comboBoxView(_ comboBoxView: GXComboBoxView, numberOfSectionInColumn column: Int, section: Int, regiseCell tableView: UITableView)
    
    /// è·å–åˆ—æ•°
    ///
    /// - Parameters:
    ///   - comboBoxView: comboBoxView
    /// - Returns: åˆ—æ•°ï¼ˆé¡¶éƒ¨æŒ‰é’®å¤šå°‘ä¸ªï¼‰
    func numberOfColumn(in comboBoxView: GXComboBoxView) -> Int
    
    /// è·å–åˆ—å¯¹åº”çš„tableViewä¸ªæ•°
    ///
    /// - Parameters:
    ///   - comboBoxView: comboBoxView
    ///   - column: åˆ—æ•°
    /// - Returns: tableViewä¸ªæ•°
    func comboBoxView(_ comboBoxView: GXComboBoxView, numberOfSectionInColumn column: Int) -> Int

    /// è·å–æ¯ä¸ªtableview rowä¸ªæ•°
    ///
    /// - Parameters:
    ///   - comboBoxView: comboBoxView
    ///   - column: åˆ—æ•°
    ///   - section: ç¬¬å‡ ä¸ªTableView
    /// - Returns: row
    func comboBoxView(_ comboBoxView: GXComboBoxView, numberOfRowsInColum column: Int, section: Int) -> Int

    /// è·å–cell
    ///
    /// - Parameters:
    ///   - comboBoxView: comboBoxView
    ///   - indexPath: indexPath
    /// - Returns: cell
    func comboBoxView(_ comboBoxView: GXComboBoxView, cellForRowAt indexPath: GXIndexPath) -> UITableViewCell
    
    /// æŒ‰é’®çš„æ ‡é¢˜
    ///
    /// - Parameters:
    ///   - comboBoxView: comboBoxView
    ///   - column: åˆ—æ•°
    /// - Returns: æŒ‰é’®æ ‡é¢˜
    func titleOfColumn(_ comboBoxView: GXComboBoxView, numberOfColumn column: Int) -> String
}

// MARK: GXComboBoxViewDelegate
protocol GXComboBoxViewDelegate {
    
    /// cell height
    ///
    /// - Parameters:
    ///   - comboBoxView: comboBoxView
    ///   - indexPath: indexPath
    /// - Returns: cell height
    func comboBoxView(_ comboBoxView: GXComboBoxView, heightForRowAt indexPath: GXIndexPath) -> CGFloat
    
    /// cell click
    ///
    /// - Parameters:
    ///   - comboBoxView: comboBoxView
    ///   - indexPath: indexPath
    func comboBoxView(_ comboBoxView: GXComboBoxView, didSelectedRowAt indexPath: GXIndexPath)
}

GXIndexPath

class GXIndexPath {
    /// åˆ— ï¼ˆé¡¶éƒ¨æŒ‰é’®tag 0ï¼Œ1ï¼Œ2...ï¼‰
    var column: Int
    /// ç¬¬å‡ ä¸ªtableview
    var section: Int
    /// ç¬¬å‡ è¡Œ
    var row: Int
    
    init(row: Int, section: Int, column: Int) {
        self.section = section
        self.row = row
        self.column = column
    }
}

Author

GXFrighting, 157610665@qq.com

License

GXComboBox is available under the MIT license. See the LICENSE file for more info.
